trans-unit.source: Enables developers to override the rendering for only the selected sections of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> or server controls in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: Permite que os desenvolvedores substituir o processamento para apenas as seções selecionadas de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> ou controles de servidor em um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> zona.

trans-unit.source: Web Parts chrome refers to the peripheral user interface (UI) elements that frame each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control or server control contained in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone.
trans-unit.target: Chrome de partes da Web refere-se para os elementos de interface do usuário do usuário periféricos que quadro cada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle ou controle de servidor contidos em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The chrome for a control includes its border, its title bar, and the icons, title text, and verbs menu that appear within the title bar.
trans-unit.target: Para um controle, o chrome inclui sua borda, sua barra de título e ícones, texto do título e menu de verbos que aparecem na barra de título.

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the chrome is set at the zone level, and applies to all the server controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: A aparência de cromo é definida no nível de zona e se aplica a todos os controles de servidor na zona.

trans-unit.source: The Web Parts control set uses the WebPartChrome class to render the chrome for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: O conjunto de controles de Web Parts usa a classe WebPartChrome para renderizar o chrome para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, this class provides a way for developers to customize the rendering of any individual section (such as the header or footer) of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone without having to handle all the rendering for those controls.
trans-unit.target: Além disso, essa classe fornece uma maneira para que os desenvolvedores personalizar a renderização de qualquer seção individual (por exemplo, o cabeçalho ou rodapé) do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controles em um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zona sem ter que lidar com todo o processamento desses controles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.CreateWebPartChromeStyle%2A> method to customize some specific style attributes applied to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone, but you can rely on the default rendering to handle the rest.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.CreateWebPartChromeStyle%2A>método personalizar alguns atributos específicos do estilo aplicado a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zona, mas você pode contar com a renderização padrão para lidar com o restante.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.CreateWebPartChromeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The WebPartChrome class contains several important methods that are useful when you want to override the rendering of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls.
trans-unit.target: A classe WebPartChrome contém vários métodos importantes que são úteis quando você deseja substituir a renderização de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: One is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.CreateWebPartChromeStyle%2A> method, which enables you to change the style attributes of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object associated with the WebPartChrome object used to render a control.
trans-unit.target: Um é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.CreateWebPartChromeStyle%2A>método, que permite que você altere os atributos de estilo do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objeto associado ao objeto WebPartChrome usado para renderizar um controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.CreateWebPartChromeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Another is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.%23ctor%2A> constructor, which you use when you override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateWebPartChrome%2A> method in a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> class to create an instance of your custom WebPartChrome object.
trans-unit.target: Outra vantagem é a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.%23ctor%2A>construtor, que você usa quando você substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateWebPartChrome%2A>método em um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>classe para criar uma instância do seu objeto personalizado do WebPartChrome.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateWebPartChrome%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Another useful method is the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A> method, which you can use to control the rendering of the content area of controls in a zone (as opposed to chrome elements such as headers, footers, and title bars).
trans-unit.target: Outro método útil é o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A>método, que você pode usar para controlar o processamento de área de conteúdo de controles em uma região (em vez de elementos de cromo como cabeçalhos, rodapés e barras de título).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderPartContents%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.GetWebPartVerbs%2A> method enables you to exclude certain verbs from being rendered, if for some reason you do not want users to see those verbs in the UI.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.GetWebPartVerbs%2A>método permite que você excluir certos verbos sejam renderizados, se por algum motivo você não deseja que os usuários para ver os verbos na interface de usuário.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.GetWebPartVerbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: Finally, if you want complete programmatic control over all aspects of rendering the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, you can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderWebPart%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Por fim, se você quiser total controle programático sobre todos os aspectos de processamento de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controles, você pode substituir o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderWebPart%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.RenderWebPart%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Several properties of the WebPartChrome class are also useful.
trans-unit.target: Várias propriedades da classe WebPartChrome também são úteis.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.Zone%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.WebPartManager%2A> properties provide references to the zone associated with the WebPartChrome object and the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instance, respectively.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.Zone%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.WebPartManager%2A>propriedades fornecem referências para a zona associada ao objeto WebPartChrome e atual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>instância, respectivamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.WebPartManager%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.Zone%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the control.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do controle.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartChrome initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> class.
trans-unit.target: O WebPartChrome inicializa uma nova instância de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>classe.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: It is used primarily by a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone in its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateWebPartChrome%2A> method to create an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object that handles the chrome rendering and any custom rendering for <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls in the zone.
trans-unit.target: Ele é usado principalmente por um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>da zona no seu <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateWebPartChrome%2A>método para criar uma instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>objeto que manipula o processamento do chrome e qualquer processamento personalizado para <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controles na zona.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.CreateWebPartChrome%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: O associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> control on the current page.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> controle na página atual.

trans-unit.source: zone is .
trans-unit.target: zoneis .

trans-unit.source: Creates the style object that supplies style attributes for each <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control rendered by the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Cria o objeto de estilo que fornece os atributos de estilo para cada <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle processado pelo <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The CreateWebPartChromeStyle method creates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style> object that is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object to render a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control.
trans-unit.target: O método CreateWebPartChromeStyle cria um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>objeto que é usado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>objeto para renderizar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Style>

trans-unit.source: The default method creates style attributes based on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType%2A> property value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control referenced in the `webPart` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método padrão cria atributos de estilo com base no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType%2A>valor da propriedade de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle referenciado no `webPart` parâmetro.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.PartChromeType%2A>

trans-unit.source: A special situation occurs when a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control is selected.
trans-unit.target: Uma situação especial ocorre quando um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle está selecionado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: If the page is in a page display mode where controls can be selected, and the current control is actually selected, the default CreateWebPartChromeStyle method also merges the style information of the control with the style information from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.SelectedPartChromeStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se a página estiver em um modo de exibição de página onde controles podem ser selecionados, e o controle atual, na verdade, está selecionado, o método padrão de CreateWebPartChromeStyle também mescla as informações de estilo do controle com as informações de estilo do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.SelectedPartChromeStyle%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.SelectedPartChromeStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control that is currently being rendered.
trans-unit.target: O controle que está sendo processado no momento.

trans-unit.source: The type of chrome for a particular control; one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"></xref> enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de cromo para um determinado controle; uma da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType"> </xref> valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: A that contains style attributes for the webPart.
trans-unit.target: Um que contém atributos de estilo para o webPart .

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: chromeType is not one of the enumeration values.
trans-unit.target: chromeTypenão é um do valores de enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether controls can be dragged into and out of the zone.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se os controles podem ser arrastados dentro e fora da zona.

trans-unit.source: The value of the DragDropEnabled property is determined by the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DragDropEnabled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade DragDropEnabled é determinado pelo valor da <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DragDropEnabled%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase.DragDropEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates whether controls can be dragged.
trans-unit.target: Um valor booliano que indica se os controles podem ser arrastados.

trans-unit.source: Excludes specific verbs from being rendered, based on criteria provided by a developer.
trans-unit.target: Exclui verbos específicos que estão sendo processados, com base em critérios fornecidos por um desenvolvedor.

trans-unit.source: The FilterWebPartVerbs method provides a way to automatically filter certain verbs from the collection of verbs associated with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, and prevent the filtered verbs from being rendered.
trans-unit.target: O método FilterWebPartVerbs fornece uma maneira de filtrar automaticamente determinados verbos da coleção de verbos associados a um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controlar e impedir que os verbos filtrados seja renderizada.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: The collection of all verbs associated with the control referenced in the `webPart` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de todos os verbos associados com o controle referenciado no `webPart` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The control currently being rendered.
trans-unit.target: O controle está sendo processado no momento.

trans-unit.source: A containing all verbs associated with the webPart.
trans-unit.target: Um que contém todos os verbos associados a webPart .

trans-unit.source: Gets the client ID for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref> object as rendered in a Web page.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a ID do cliente para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref> objeto conforme renderizado em uma página da Web.

trans-unit.source: The GetWebPartChromeClientID method gets the client ID of the table that contains the `webPart` being rendered.
trans-unit.target: O método GetWebPartChromeClientID obtém a ID do cliente da tabela que contém o `webPart` está sendo processado.

trans-unit.source: The table is the rendered output that corresponds directly to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object, and is used as a container to apply styles and create a modular layout for the control.
trans-unit.target: A tabela é a saída renderizada corresponde diretamente para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>de objeto e é usado como um contêiner para aplicar estilos e criar um layout modular para o controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: It is useful to get the client ID of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object for client-side scripting purposes, if you want to change something in the chrome without having to post the page back to the server.
trans-unit.target: É útil obter a ID de cliente a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>do objeto para fins de script do lado do cliente, se você quiser alterar algo no cromo sem a necessidade de enviar a página para o servidor.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: The control currently being rendered.
trans-unit.target: O controle está sendo processado no momento.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the client ID for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a ID do cliente para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the client ID for the table cell that contains the title for a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a ID do cliente para a célula da tabela que contém o título de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The GetWebPartTitleClientID method retrieves the client ID value for the table cell that contains the title of the `webPart` being rendered.
trans-unit.target: O método GetWebPartTitleClientID recupera o valor de ID de cliente para a célula da tabela que contém o título do `webPart` está sendo processado.

trans-unit.source: An important scenario in which the GetWebPartTitleClientID method is used to get the client ID of the title cell of the `webPart` is for the Web Parts drag-and-drop feature.
trans-unit.target: Um cenário importante na qual o método GetWebPartTitleClientID é usado para obter a ID do cliente da célula do título do `webPart` para o recurso de arrastar e soltar de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: The method is also useful for other client-side scripting purposes.
trans-unit.target: O método também é útil para outros fins de script do lado do cliente.

trans-unit.source: For example, you could change the title or the style of the cell with client-side scripting, rather than having to post the page back to the server.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode alterar o título ou o estilo da célula com scripts do lado do cliente, em vez de ter que postar a página de volta para o servidor.

trans-unit.source: The control currently being rendered.
trans-unit.target: O controle está sendo processado no momento.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the client ID for the title of the webPart.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém a ID do cliente para o título do webPart .

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of verbs that should be rendered with a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de verbos que deve ser processado com um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The GetWebPartVerbs method provides developers with an opportunity to override the method and exclude certain verbs from being rendered.
trans-unit.target: O método GetWebPartVerbs fornece aos desenvolvedores uma oportunidade para substituir o método e excluir determinados verbos seja renderizada.

trans-unit.source: This is similar to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.FilterWebPartVerbs%2A> method, which also can exclude verbs from being rendered.
trans-unit.target: Isso é semelhante de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.FilterWebPartVerbs%2A>método, que também pode excluir verbos do que está sendo processado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome.FilterWebPartVerbs%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, the GetWebPartVerbs method is not meant for cases where you want to check some criteria to decide whether to render a verb.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, o método GetWebPartVerbs não serve para casos em que você deseja verificar alguns critérios para decidir se deve processar um verbo.

trans-unit.source: Instead, this method is useful when you know in advance that you always want to exclude a certain verb.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, esse método é útil quando você souber com antecedência que você deseje excluir um determinado verbo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you develop a custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> class, you might decide that you always want to exclude the close verb on <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls, so that users can never close the controls.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você desenvolver um personalizado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>classe, você pode decidir que você deseje excluir o verbo fechar nos <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controla, para que os usuários nunca podem fechar os controles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: Rather than setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A> property to `false` on all the controls, you can simply override the GetWebPartVerbs method and exclude close verbs from being rendered on any <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control rendered with your custom <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object.
trans-unit.target: Em vez de configuração de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>propriedade `false` em todos os controles, você pode simplesmente substituir o método GetWebPartVerbs e excluir verbos fechar sejam renderizados em qualquer <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle processado com personalizados <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart.AllowClose%2A>

trans-unit.source: The control currently being rendered.
trans-unit.target: O controle está sendo processado no momento.

trans-unit.source: A containing all the verbs that should be rendered with webPart.
trans-unit.target: Um que contém todos os verbos que devem ser processados com webPart .

trans-unit.source: webPart is .
trans-unit.target: webPartis .

trans-unit.source: Performs tasks that must be done prior to rendering <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Executa tarefas que devem ser executadas antes da renderização <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controles.

trans-unit.source: Renders the main content area of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control, excluding the header and footer.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza a área de conteúdo principal de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle, excluindo o cabeçalho e rodapé.

trans-unit.source: The RenderPartContents method enables you to override the rendering of the body area of `webPart`, while leaving rendering of the header and footer to the default rendering.
trans-unit.target: O método RenderPartContents permite que você substitua a renderização da área do corpo de `webPart`, deixando a renderização de cabeçalho e rodapé para o processamento padrão.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the `webPart` content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que recebe o `webPart` conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The control currently being rendered.
trans-unit.target: O controle está sendo processado no momento.

trans-unit.source: Renders a complete <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"></xref> control with all its sections.
trans-unit.target: Renderiza uma completa <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart"> </xref> controle com todas as suas seções.

trans-unit.source: The RenderWebPart method renders the complete <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, with header, contents, and footer.
trans-unit.target: O método RenderWebPart renderiza completo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle com cabeçalho, o conteúdo e o rodapé.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>

trans-unit.source: Overriding this method gives a developer complete programmatic control over rendering all aspects of `webPart`, and for that reason, overriding this method is quite complex.
trans-unit.target: Substituir essa proporciona ao método um desenvolvedor concluir controle programático sobre processamento de todos os aspectos de `webPart`, e por esse motivo, substituir esse método é muito complexa.

trans-unit.source: As with some other methods in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> class that developers can override, if you override this method, a common and useful approach is to call the base method first, take the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that is returned, and customize some of its properties, rather than handling the complete rendering yourself.
trans-unit.target: Assim como acontece com alguns outros métodos o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>classe que os desenvolvedores podem substituir, se você substituir esse método, uma comum e abordagem útil é chamar o método base primeiro, levar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>controle é retornado e personalizar algumas de suas propriedades, em vez de tratar o processamento completo por conta própria.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> that receives the `webPart` content.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> que recebe o `webPart` conteúdo.

trans-unit.source: The control currently being rendered.
trans-unit.target: O controle está sendo processado no momento.

trans-unit.source: The control that webPart refers to is .
trans-unit.target: O controle que webPart refere-se ao .

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência ao atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> instância.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartManager property provides a reference to the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> instance on the page.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade WebPartManager fornece uma referência ao atual <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>instância na página.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>

trans-unit.source: A reference to the current <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"></xref> on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência ao atual <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager"> </xref> na página da Web.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> zone.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma referência associados <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> zona.

trans-unit.source: The Zone property provides a reference to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase> zone that contains the controls for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> object provides rendering.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de zona fornece uma referência para a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>zona que contém os controles para o qual o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome>objeto fornece renderização.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase>

trans-unit.source: A reference to a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma referência a um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBase"> </xref> que está associado a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartChrome"> </xref>.
